item.title: Typography
item.description: Typography is the art and technique of arranging type. It is the method used to make text readable, legible, beautiful and meaningful. Good typography is readable. No matter how stylish and polished your font is, if it isn't readable no one is gonna read it. The beauty of type lies in its utility; prettiness without readability serves neither the author not reader. - James Felici The main way in which we style our texts is with fonts.
